identity.name: Obsidian Vault
identity.core_philosophy: Zero-Trust, Zero-Clutter. Every pixel implies security.

primary.name: Manrope
primary.usage: Body text, UI elements, standard labels

secondary.name: JetBrains Mono
secondary.usage: Headings, Data values, Encryption keys, Timestamps, 'Critical' tags

rules: Headings (H1-H3) MUST use JetBrains Mono. Letter-spacing: -0.02em.
All 'Data' (dates, IDs, hash values) MUST use JetBrains Mono.
Body text uses Manrope for maximum legibility.

containers.card_style: Flat background (#0A0A0A), 1px border (#27272A), No shadow by default. Hover: Border becomes Primary.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(139,92,246,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-border text-white hover:border-primary hover:text-primary transition-colors

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md font-mono text-sm placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

cards.task_card: group relative overflow-hidden bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-border hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300
cards.dashboard_widget: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-border p-6 flex flex-col justify-between

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use framer-motion to animate a gradient border on active tasks.
visual_enhancers.encryption_indicator: A pulsing green dot (#00FF94) + 'AES-256-GCM' text in JetBrains Mono.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Apply a subtle SVG noise overlay at 2% opacity to the main background to prevent banding.

login_background.usage: Background for Login/Master Password screen. Apply heavy overlay (bg-black/80).

empty_state.usage: Place in 'No Tasks' empty state, masked or low opacity.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets APCA standards. Light gray (#A1A1AA) on Black is safe. Dark gray is not.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Import 'Manrope' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. THEME: Force 'dark' class on the html/body tag. Do not implement a light mode toggle (Security apps are dark by default).
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' for the Dashboard. Do not use simple rows.
5. SECURITY UI: Every sensitive action (delete, export) must have a 'Confirm Password' or 'Biometric' mock step.
6. ENCRYPTION VISUALS: When a task is saved, show a brief 'Locking...' animation (icon transition from open to closed).
7. TOASTS: Use 'sonner' for all notifications. Style them to match the dark theme (black bg, white text).
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all inputs, buttons, and task items.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. No default blue/gray themes.
Depth: Use z-index and subtle borders to create depth. Do not use heavy drop shadows.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly (0.98) on click.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-12 for section padding. Don't cram content.
